headline.main: In Defense of Eating Rich Food...; Defending Rich Food . . . In Small Portions

docs.abstract: 1st article in Craig Claiborne series on US diet; drawings (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: PARANOIA, thy name is the American diet. Butter, eggs and cream the absolute foundations of haute cuisine have become the dreaded Gorgons, the absolute no-nos, the menace foods of the century.
docs.snippet: PARANOIA, thy name is the American diet. Butter, eggs and cream the absolute foundations of haute cuisine have  become the dreaded Gorgons, the absolute no-nos, the menace foods of the century.
